questions.question: Mumbai Indians have won the most IPL titles (5 as of 2023).
Royal Challengers Bangalore have won an IPL title.
Chennai Super Kings were suspended from IPL for two seasons (2016-2017).
Kolkata Knight Riders won their first IPL title in 2014.
Rajasthan Royals won the inaugural IPL season in 2008.
Sunrisers Hyderabad was originally called Deccan Chargers.
Lucknow Super Giants reached the playoffs in their debut season (2022).
Punjab Kings (formerly Kings XI Punjab) have reached the IPL finals three times.
Delhi Capitals changed their name from Delhi Daredevils in 2019.
Gujarat Titans won the IPL title in their debut season (2022).
